FuncDef:
The hop-limit command sets the hop limit for a P2MP LSP in a P2MP tunnel template.
The undo hop-limit command restores the default value of the hop limit.
By default, a P2MP LSP established using the P2MP tunnel template contains a maximum of 32 hops.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of hops that a P2MP TE LSP supports.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 32.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To limit the maximum number of hops on a P2MP TE LSP that is established using a P2MP tunnel template, run the hop-limit command.
Prerequisites
A P2MP tunnel template has been configured using the mpls te p2mp-template command.
